title: [Large-Scale] Handwriting Quality Improvement Strategies Through Structural Analysis of Chinese Characters

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Stroke Order for Chinese Characters and Recognition of 200 Basic Characters
context.additional_context: Program to strengthen Chinese character utilization skills for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields

learning_goals: Learners will analyze the impact of structural features (stroke count, bends/hooks) on handwriting style with 85% accuracy.
Learners will identify and correct three problematic stroke types (rightward stroke collapse, folded strokes) with 90% accuracy in simulated environments.
Learners can improve the Composite Stability metric of handwriting by over 20% after VR-based training

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
